text: what is the best way to create theme.jason?

hello everyone!  I am noticing that the HubDB IMPORT feature seems to not have a bugged prompt when reaching the first screen.  The "Choose File" button does not bring up any prompt to allow a file to be selected.  Is this an actual bug?
